Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கெடுங்காலைக் கைவிடுவார் கேண்மை அடுங்காலை உள்ளினும் உள்ளஞ் சுடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The very thought of the friendship of those who have deserted one at the approach of adversity will burn one's mind at the time of death.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An old, dying person lies on their deathbed, in their final moments ('அடுங்காலை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Their mind is not at peace. A fiery, painful memory is shown materializing above them: the memory of a so-called friend abandoning them during a past time of great trouble ('கெடுங்காலைக் கைவிடுவார்').
Layered_Composition.Background: This memory is so painful that it is literally burning their soul, visualized as their heart or spirit being scorched by the flames of this old betrayal ('உள்ளம் சுடும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even at the moment of death, the memory of being abandoned by a friend in a time of ruin is a pain that will burn the soul.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The fiery, burning memory is the central image. The deathbed setting emphasizes that this is a pain that never goes away.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Painful, bitter, a memory that burns, tragic.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The room is dark and somber, lit only by the hellish, fiery glow of the painful memory. The colors are dark reds, oranges, and blacks.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A close-up on the dying person's face, showing the anguish caused by the memory, with the fiery memory visualized above them.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with intense, emotional expression and realistic fire effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The fire of the memory is the key light source.

Cultural_Anchors: Friends who abandon you in ruin ('கெடுங்காலைக் கைவிடுவார்')
A thought that burns the soul ('உள்ளம் சுடும்')
